Name: Ancient Olive Plant
SeedDescription: Plant in spring, summer or fall to grow an ancient olive plant. Takes 46 days to mature, and keeps producing after the first harvest.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plantalas en primavera, verano u otoño para cultivar una antigua planta de oliva. Tarda 46 días en madurary continúa produciendo luego de la primer cosecha.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄, 여름, 또는 가을 작물. 성장하려면 46일 소요되며, 수확한 후에도 계속 작물이 생산됩니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在春季、夏季或秋季种植一种古老的橄榄植物。成熟需要46天，并在第一次收获后继续生产。
